apresentacao.descricao: I am a Full Stack Developer passionate about creating mobile solutions, focusing on robust, scalable, and intuitive applications. My goal is to transform ideas into impactful digital experiences, always striving to combine design, functionality, and innovation.

WelcomeTopic.sub-titulo: Want to know more about me?
WelcomeTopic.descricao: I am driven by curiosity and a constant desire to learn. Currently, I am expanding my skills with Flutter, exploring cross-platform development to create even more versatile solutions. With experience in front-end and back-end development, I am dedicated to building projects that connect people, solve real-world problems, and promote positive impacts through technology.

Projects.sub-titulo: Some of the projects I built:

fittrack.descricao: FitTrack is a mobile app developed to facilitate the integrated management of workouts and nutrition, helping users set health and wellness goals. The platform offers a comprehensive solution by tracking both physical progress and diet in one place.

vitalhub.descricao: VitalHub is a mobile platform that simplifies the interaction between doctors and patients by centralizing appointments, consultations, and communication. The solution allows for efficient appointment scheduling, GPS route visualization to the clinic, and direct contact with doctors, optimizing the experience for both and eliminating fragmentation in the process.

eventplus.descricao: Event Plus is an intuitive and robust web application focused on the complete management of institutional events. The platform enables effective planning, organization, and management of events, optimizing the process from creation to completion.

techconnect.descricao: Tech Connect is a social network that brings technology enthusiasts together in a collaborative digital space. It fosters knowledge sharing, networking, and project development, connecting developers and innovators. With an inclusive environment, Tech Connect promotes continuous learning and technological advancement.

checkpoint.descricao: The Checkpoint Project is a web system that automates internship management, replacing manual processes with an efficient and gamified solution. It offers features like attendance tracking via login and logout, PDF report generation, and automated absence justifications, enhancing organization and engagement.

Services.sub-titulo: What I can do for you:

mobile.descricao: I develop applications for Android and iOS using React Native, with modern interfaces and efficient functionalities.

web.descricao: I transform your ideas into a professional and attractive website, focused on conveying your message clearly and effectively.

backend.descricao: I create robust and scalable APIs using C#, integrated with databases like SQL Server and MongoDB.

cloud.titulo: Integration and Automation with Microsoft Azure
cloud.descricao: I implement cloud solutions, configuring CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps, in addition to infrastructure and service automation.

performance.descricao: I enhance the performance of websites and applications, ensuring fast and efficient navigation, optimizing for SEO and accessibility.

design.descricao: I create intuitive and responsive interfaces with React, Next.js, and Tailwind CSS, which adapt perfectly to any device.

devops.descricao: I configure continuous development pipelines with Git and Azure DevOps, facilitating the integration of new features securely.

project_management.descricao: I manage software projects using Trello and agile methodologies, ensuring organization and timely delivery.

database.descricao: I perform integration and optimization of relational and non-relational databases, such as SQL Server and MongoDB, for efficient data storage.

fullstack.descricao: I create complete applications, from front-end to back-end, using technologies like React, C#, MongoDB, and SQL Server.

support.descricao: I offer ongoing support to ensure your systems and applications function stably and securely.
